price: 109. Alle baana leh waxa ku sugan samooyinka iyo waxa ku sugan arlada. xagga Allayna umuurahoo dhan u noqdaan.
arabic: وَلِلَّهِ مَا فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَمَا فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِۚ وَإِلَى ٱللَّهِ تُرۡجَعُ ٱلۡأُمُورُ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: walillahi mā fī al-samāwāti wamā fī al-arḍi wa-ilā al-lahi tur'jaʿu al-umūru
